caption.p: Impact of AAF subtype expression on the aggregative adherence phenotype. Shown are bacterial aggregates formed by EAEC strain 55989 agg3 − heterologously expressing AAF/I, AAF/III, AAF/IV and AAF/V on HEp2 cells as indicated. NC: negative control (pBAD24); Medium: uninfected HEp2 cells; Scale bar: 10 µm; Upper panels: 10x magnification, Lower panels: 40x magnification. White arrows indicate rudimentary honey comb formation
